subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After an up and down off-season, this is the team, for better or worse, that will determine the fate of Jerry Manuel and Omar Minaya. Adding Ike Davis, it would seem, can only help.
snippet: After an up and down off-season, this is the team, for better or worse, that will determine the fate of Jerry Manuel and Omar Minaya. Adding Ike Davis, it would seem, can only help.
